mapper.select: SELECT comment_no as commentNo, notice_no as noticeNo, isSecret , member_id as memberId, comment_content as commentContent, createdate FROM comment WHERE notice_no=#{noticeNo} ORDER by comment_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( notice_no , member_id , comment_pw , comment_content , isSecret ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo} , #{memberId} , PASSWORD(#{commentPw}) , #{commentContent} , #{isSecret} )
